articles.title: Zack Snyder Unsure Ben Affleck Would Want to Return For Batman Prequel Series on HBO Max - ComicBook.com
articles.description: Now that Zack Snyder's Justice League is out on HBO Max, fans are considering ways to extend the reach of Zack Snyder's vision into new projects. While most would consider a sequel to be ideal, the current streaming landscape means prequels and spinoff series…
